content.description: A researcher collected data on the age, in years, and the growth of sea turtles. The following graph is a residual plot of the regression of growth versus age.
content.question: Does the residual plot support the appropriateness of a linear model?

choices.label: Yes, because there is a clear pattern displayed in the residual plot.
Yes, because about half the residuals are positive and the other half are negative.
Yes, because as age increases, the residuals increase.
No, because the points appear to be randomly distributed.
No, because the graph displays a <math alttext="U" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>U</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>-shaped pattern.

content.answer: No, because the graph displays a <math alttext="U" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>U</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>-shaped pattern.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
